actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-444.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 239 - 136 (Record Vote No: 447).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of a resolution by the Committee on Rules providing for the consideration of the Conference Report on H.R. 3128.

summary.text: Provides for the consideration of a resolution reported by the Committee on Rules providing for the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 3128 (spending and revenue provisions).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of a resolution by the Committee on Rules providing for the consideration of the Conference Report on H.R. 3128.
